activities:
* We collect personally identifiable information when you register on our web site or otherwise voluntarily provide such information ("Personal Information").

    * We offer you choices when we ask for Personal Information, whenever reasonably possible.

    * We use Personal Information to communicate with you.

    * We use cookies and other technologies to enhance your online experience and to improve the quality of our services.

    * We automatically record and store information when you visit our web site, including IP addresses, browser types, ISP, operating systems, and access dates/times.

    * You may decline to provide any or some of your Personal Information to us and/or refuse cookies in your browser, although some of our features or services may not function properly as a result.

    * We use and disclose to third parties aggregated demographic non-personally identifiable information for research purposes.

    * We may also share information, including Personal Information, with third parties in limited circumstances, including when complying with legal process, preventing fraud or imminent harm, ensuring the security of our network and services, and enforcing our web site’s Terms and Conditions of Use located at www.chatthreads.com/terms_of_use/.
